entry.title: MTA Microsoft Technical Associate (Exam 98-361) Passed
entry.content:
Today, I passed the MTA Microsoft Technical Associate 98-361 Exam with 91 score. Giving the MTA 98-361 Exam was a great experience. My next goal is to prepare for MCSD 70-480 Exam.

MTA 98-361 Exam is not compulsary, but it is a good step to get into the Certification world.

I’ll be posting a series of blog posts about how I prepared for the MTA 98-361 exam which can help newbies who are thinking about giving this exam.
